Question
========

Renske expects a positive association between two variables and aims to test this with a linear regression analysis. She considers a one-sided versus two-sided test. Which statement is true? Complete the following sentence. The _____ value of a one-sided test is _____ compared with a two-sided test.

  
Answerlist
----------
* Critical; lower.
* Critical; higher.
* Found; lower.
* Found; higher.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
